root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 17-18-3, translated into en
root.data: Goal 17. Strengthen the means of implementing and revitalizing the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development17.18 By 2020, provide increased support for capacity building in developing countries, including least developed countries and small island developing States, with the goal of having much more data available for quality, up-to-date and accurate, disaggregated by income level, sex, age, race, ethnicity, migration status, disability and geographic location, and other country specific characteristics17.18.3 Number of countries with a fully funded national statistical plan under implementation, by source of fundingISTEEBUNDAYISENGA ModestSocial studies and statistics and poverty monitoring (ESSSP)ESSSP department manager794019391158 BUJUMBURAndayimode2010@gmail.comSpecify if the country has an NSDS in progress and whose funding is 100% availableno unitISTEEBUAdministrative dataN / AN / AISTEEBUISTEEBUThe snds exists but it is not fully fundedConfirm or deny the existence of a fully funded NSDSN / AAvailable nationally
